授業目的: 本授業の目的は、受講者が中級程度の内容のフランス語を書く力を身につけ，自立した言語使用者となることである。
到達目標: 本授業では、受講者が、フランス語で，身近な話題だけでなく，抽象的な話題に関しても，ある程度の長さの筋の通った文章を，書くことができることを到達目標とする。
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
We will follow the Textbook "Edito, Méthode de français", niveau A2, covering 6 units each semester: every unit will take 2 weeks.
Grammar, vocabulary, and cultural insights, are the main items on which every lesson will be focused.

トピック.授業計画1: We will follow the Textbook "Edito, Méthode de français", niveau A2, covering 6 units each semester: every unit will take 2 weeks. The first session will be devoted to a general presentation of the class, and the students will be asked to introduce themselves. In the last session, the teacher will explain the outlines of the final homework the students will be required to provide.
トピック.授業外学習2:
Every week, the students will be asked to do a range of short exercises taken from the textbook (those exercises will not always be screened by the teacher - only from time to time - but the commitment of the students will be controlled through an oral review of the exercises).
At the end of the semester, and once or twice before that, a more substantial task will be required, namely writing a short text.
The weekly homework also includes some reading (short texts), learning of lists of words, and the review of the previous week's lesson (released by the teacher through a word file).

教科書/Required texts1: Edito, Méthode de français Niveau A2
